programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: 3 Babes, 100 Guns and a Fat Chick

programme.title: Lucky
programme.desc: A viagem espiritual de um ateu de 90 anos e as personagens peculiares que habitam na sua cidade, no meio do nada. Tendo sobrevivido aos seus contemporâneos, o tempestuoso e independente Lucky inicia uma jornada de autoexploração, rumo à iluminação.

programme.title: Rob Roy
programme.desc: Este filme retrata a história do herói escocês do século XVIII, Robert Roy MacGregor. Entre cenários de beleza fantástica e a dura vida da comunidade, Rob Roy vê-se forçado a pedir dinheiro emprestado ao sinistro Montrose quando um duro inverno ameaça as majestosas Terras Altas escocesas.

programme.title: Operação Especial
programme.desc: Na Nigéria, no seguimento de um golpe de Estado, um grupo de soldados de elite americanos escoltam na selva uma médica e aldeãos ameaçados pelos rebeldes.

programme.title: Inferno Canibal
programme.desc: Um grupo de estudantes ativistas viaja até à Amazónia para salvar a floresta tropical. Mas rapidamente descobre que não estão ali sozinhos e que nenhuma boa ação fica impune...

programme.title: Climax
programme.desc: Passado em 1996, e inspirado em eventos reais, o último filme do provocador Gaspar Noé atira-nos para a loucura malévola que envolve um grupo de dançarinos após uma taça de sangria ser misturada com LSD.

programme.title: Valquíria
programme.desc: Ao ver Hitler precipitar a Alemanha e a Europa para o caos, o coronel Stauffenberg começa a acreditar que é preciso travá-lo. Em 1943, quando recupera de ferimentos sofridos em combate, reúne forças junto da Resistência Alemã e organiza uma conspiração para matar Hitler: a "Operação Valquíria".

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: Three Weddings and a Funeral: Part 1

programme.title: A Vida é Bela
programme.desc: Guido, um empregado judeu, casa-se com Dora, uma professora que esteve prometida a um fascista. Mas, em 1945, Guido, o tio e o filho são presos e enviados para um campo de concentração. Guido usa a imaginação para tornar o trágico ambiente onde o filho está inserido num mágico país das maravilhas.

programme.title: Mamã
programme.desc: Uma mãe solteira tenta sustentar-se a si e ao filho, de 15 anos, que sofre de Perturbação de Hiperatividade e Défice de Atenção. Quando a nova e peculiar vizinha se oferece para a ajudar, encontram um novo sentido de equilíbrio e esperança.

programme.title: Lucky
programme.desc: A viagem espiritual de um ateu de 90 anos e as personagens peculiares que habitam na sua cidade, no meio do nada. Tendo sobrevivido aos seus contemporâneos, o tempestuoso e independente Lucky inicia uma jornada de autoexploração, rumo à iluminação.

programme.title: Lobijovem
programme.desc: Scott Howard, um estudante de liceu, acredita estar condenado à indiferença e à banalidade na cruel hierarquia escolar. No entanto, acaba por se tornar num fenómeno local quando se transforma num lobisomem.

programme.title: Cliente de Risco
programme.desc: Mick Haller, um advogado criminal de Los Angeles, usa o seu carro como escritório. A rotina de trabalho passa por atender clientes e defender pequenas causas, até que surge o grande desafio da sua carreira: defender um playboy de Beverly Hills, que foi acusado de violação e tentativa de homicídio.

programme.title: Um Perfeito Estranho
programme.desc: Quando a jornalista Rowena Price descobre que o homicídio da sua amiga pode estar relacionado com o poderoso executivo Harrison Hill, infiltra-se numa grande companhia publicitária com o intuito de o desmascarar.

programme.title: Operação Especial
programme.desc: Na Nigéria, no seguimento de um golpe de Estado, um grupo de soldados de elite americanos escoltam na selva uma médica e aldeãos ameaçados pelos rebeldes.

Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"farshidkarimi"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Is it Just Me or....","reviewBody":"I loved this series.

But, it started a nosedive crash into boredom and sloppiness with the introduction of new actors in place of Thomas Gibson and Matthew Gray Gubler.

The new characters are dull, drab, hamming their roles and do not fit with the group nicely.

The run-time of the episodes also dropped and they wander off into the personal lives of the characters.

Is it just me who feeling the show is going downhill or other fans too?

programme.title: Cidade Dividida
programme.desc: Desconfiado de que a sua esposa lhe é infiel, Nicholas Hostetler, o popular presidente da Câmara de Nova Iorque, decide recorrer aos serviços de Billy Taggart, um ex-polícia caído em desgraça e que agora ganha a vida como detetive particular.

programme.title: Mestres da Ilusão 2
programme.desc: Um ano após os eventos relatados no primeiro filme, em que arrebataram o público ao mesmo tempo que conseguiram enganar o FBI, os Quatro Cavaleiros regressam aos palcos.

programme.title: Terra Prometida
programme.desc: Um comercial de uma empresa de gás natural desloca-se a uma pequena cidade rural para adquirir os direitos de perfuração dos terrenos. Uma tarefa aparentemente simples, mas que se transforma num pesadelo com a chegada de um astuto ativista ambiental.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. programme.title: Ex_Machina
programme.desc: Caleb, um jovem programador da maior empresa de Internet do mundo, participa numa experiência estranha e fascinante. Ele deverá interagir com a primeira inteligência artificial do mundo, incorporada no corpo de uma bonita rapariga robótica.

programme.title: O Primeiro Encontro
programme.desc: Quando 12 naves espaciais aterram em vários pontos do globo, a especialista em linguística Louise Banks é integrada numa equipa de elite. Com a guerra em "stand by", cabe a Louise tentar comunicar com os alienígenas. Ela espera resolver o mistério, mas pode colocar em risco a própria Humanidade.

programme.title: Realizar o Impossível
programme.desc: Quando, aos 15 anos, Jay descobre que as míticas ondas gigantes da Califórnia, as Mavericks, são reais e existem a poucos quilómetros de sua casa, pede ajuda à lenda local Frosty Hesson. Os dois embarcam numa busca para realizar o impossível, forjando uma amizade única que transforma as suas vidas.

programme.title: Ender's Game - O Jogo Final
programme.desc: Num futuro próximo, o jovem Ender Wiggin é recrutado para liderar a luta contra os Formics, uma raça alienígena hostil. Esta quase acabou com a vida humana durante a sua primeira invasão ao planeta Terra...

programme.title: Livrai-nos do Mal
programme.desc: Sarchie, um oficial da Polícia de Nova Iorque, começa a investigar uma série de crimes perturbantes e inexplicáveis. Alia-se a um padre pouco convencional, experiente nos rituais do exorcismo, para combater as terríveis e demoníacas possessões que aterrorizam a sua cidade.

programme.title: Aposta de Solteiros
programme.desc: Sete amigos fazem uma aposta: o que se casar por último leva todo o dinheiro. Um deles apaixona-se de facto pela rapariga que contratou para isco.

programme.title: Engana-me Que Eu Gosto
programme.desc: Danny, solteiro e um cirurgião plástico bem-sucedido, usa um estratagema de engate muito pouco convencional: diz que é casado, evitando assim envolvimentos mais profundos. Isto até se apaixonar por Palmer. No entanto, infelizmente, a rapariga julga que ele é casado.

programme.title: O Motel
programme.desc: O carro de David e Amy Fox avaria no meio do nada e o casal tem de passar a a noite num motel. Tudo piora quando descobrem que os filmes de terror a que assistem foram filmados naquele quarto, que tem câmaras escondidas em vários sítios. A partir desse momento, lutam pela sobrevivência!

programme.title: Morangos com Açúcar - O Filme
programme.desc: Margarida e Rui, depois de estudarem em Inglaterra, regressam a Portugal para um acampamento de férias, onde reencontram amigos de outros tempos. Aproveitam também para participar num Festival de Verão. Missy M, a Tatiana mete-se no meio do casalinho e vive uma aventura romântica com Rui.

programme.title: Minorca
programme.desc: Depois de esconder um diamante roubado no saco de uma mulher, Calvin, que mais do que anão tem o tamanho de um bebé, deve infiltrar-se na casa dela para o reaver.

programme.title: Comando
programme.desc: John Matrix, ex-militar, levava uma vida tranquila com a sua filha. Contudo, um grupo de mercenários raptou-a e John fará de tudo para a recuperar. O seu plano passa por fingir colaborar com eles, para depois os eliminar um a um.

programme.title: Encontro Inesquecível
programme.desc: Um charmoso executivo tem um encontro às cegas com uma jovem, uma vez que precisa de levar companhia ao jantar de negócios da empresa. No entanto, a mulher tem um problema: perde totalmente o controlo quando bebe álcool!

programme.title: Payback - A Vingança
programme.desc: O assalto foi fácil e o dinheiro estava no papo. Mas ao dividir os lucros, Val cometeu três erros: levou o dinheiro e a mulher de Porter, e tentou acabar com a vida do parceiro. Agora, Porter quer o dinheiro de volta e não interessa como o consegue. E não vai parar enquanto não tiver a sua vingança.

programme.title: O Ben Está de Volta
programme.desc: Ben Burns é um jovem toxicodependente em tratamento, que regressa a casa, inesperadamente, na véspera de Natal. A mãe recebe-o de braços abertos, mas, durante 24 turbulentas horas, ela fará de tudo para evitar que Ben tenha uma recaída...

programme.title: Crime Sangrento
programme.desc: Depois de mudar-se para Seattle, Daniel Pruitt, um detetive da polícia, atende aos pedidos da mulher Jessica e concorda em acampar na floresta. Quando ele vai comprar comida ela é atacada, mas Jessica consegue fugir e Daniel encontra-a caída no meio da estrada.

programme.title: Depois da Terra
programme.desc: Uma aterragem forçada deixa o adolescente Kitai Raige e o seu lendário pai, Cypher, presos na Terra, mil anos depois da Humanidade ter escapado a eventos cataclísmicos. Com Cypher gravemente ferido, Kitai embarca numa perigosa viagem para pedir ajuda.

programme.title: Mitos Urbanos
programme.desc: Uma aluna do liceu suspeita que os assassinatos do Campus estão relacionados com Lendas Urbanas.

programme.title: Drácula de Bram Stoker
programme.desc: Neste remake da clássica história, o príncipe da Transilvânia, no século XIX, viaja até Londres em busca de amor humano. Depois de viver sozinho durante anos, o desejo de Drácula por algo humano transforma-se no seu maior propósito. Em Londres, este encontra Mina, uma sósia da sua falecida mulher.

programme.title: A Rapariga No Comboio
programme.desc: Rachel fantasia com a vida aparentemente perfeita de um casal, que vive do outro lado da linha do comboio que apanha diariamente. Quando, da janela, observa algo que a perturba, vê-se envolvida na investigação de uma pessoa desaparecida...

programme.title: A Decisão Mortal
programme.desc: Anna e Tom querem começar uma família, mas vivem dificuldades económicas. Até ao dia em que descobrem o seu inquilino morto e um saco cheio de dinheiro em casa dele. Ao guardar segredo e ficar com o dinheiro, o casal torna-se um alvo a abater.

programme.title: Martin e Lewis
programme.desc: A história da relação conturbada de 10 anos entre Dean Martin e Jerry Lewis.

programme.title: Collide - A Alta Velocidade
programme.desc: Depois de um assalto correr mal, Casey Stein é obrigado a fugir de um gangue cruel, que tudo fará para recuperar os seus bens valiosos. Sem opções e para proteger a namorada, Casey envolve-se numa louca perseguição pelas autoestradas de Munique.

programme.title: Jogo Limpo
programme.desc: A agente Valerie Plame descobre que o Iraque não possui um programa de armas nucleares. O marido, Joe, é enviado para África a fim de investigar rumores da comercialização de urânio. Ao descobrir que tais negócios nunca existiram, Joe escreve um artigo que despoleta uma tempestade de controvérsia.

programme.title: Engana-me Que Eu Gosto
programme.desc: Danny, solteiro e um cirurgião plástico bem-sucedido, usa um estratagema de engate muito pouco convencional: diz que é casado, evitando assim envolvimentos mais profundos. Isto até se apaixonar por Palmer. No entanto, infelizmente, a rapariga julga que ele é casado.

programme.title: Morangos com Açúcar - O Filme
programme.desc: Margarida e Rui, depois de estudarem em Inglaterra, regressam a Portugal para um acampamento de férias, onde reencontram amigos de outros tempos. Aproveitam também para participar num Festival de Verão. Missy M, a Tatiana mete-se no meio do casalinho e vive uma aventura romântica com Rui.

programme.title: Soldado Destino
programme.desc: Antes de John McCain ser candidato à presidência dos EUA, pilotou bombardeiros no Vietname. Após o seu avião ser atingido, torna-se recluso na célebre prisão conhecida como Hanoi Hilton. Durante anos, ele passa por um inferno, mas não lhe conseguem roubar a sua honra, a nenhum custo.

programme.title: Dinheiro Quente
programme.desc: Seth Davis desistiu da faculdade, mas, para tentar viver à altura dos padrões de exigência do pai, arranja emprego como corretor numa empresa de investimento e começa rapidamente a ter sucesso. Só que nesse emprego nem tudo é tão legal como parece.

programme.title: Aposta de Solteiros
programme.desc: Sete amigos fazem uma aposta: o que se casar por último leva todo o dinheiro. Um deles apaixona-se de facto pela rapariga que contratou para isco.

programme.title: Tudo a Nu Na Normandia
programme.desc: Numa localidade da Normandia, a crise afetou profundamente os rendimentos das famílias, mas ninguém consegue chamar a atenção do Governo. Quando um artista, famoso pelas suas fotografias de nus, ali passa, surge a oportunidade de dar nas vistas...

programme.title: O Sorriso das Estrelas
programme.desc: Numa estalagem, uma mãe de família, que se encontra em processo de divórcio, e um cirurgião, que acaba de sofrer, também ele, um grande trauma, apaixonam-se.

programme.title: O Nevoeiro
programme.desc: Numa cidade, prestes a festejar o seu centenário, os habitantes tornam-se vítimas de espetros assassinos que escondem um segredo inquietante.

programme.title: Pulse
programme.desc: Um pulso inteligente de eletricidade move-se de casa em casa. Aterroriza os ocupantes, assumindo o controlo dos aparelhos, matando-os ou fazendo-os destruir a casa.

programme.title: Uns Pais do Pior
programme.desc: Frank e Nancy levam a sua única filha à faculdade e quando regressam a casa, num bairro da classe alta, constatam que as suas poupanças diminuem rapidamente. Recorrem então a medidas extremas para esconder a sua situação e manter as aparências...

programme.title: No Centro do Palco - Toca a Aquecer!
programme.desc: Doze jovens bailarinos competem entre si para ver quem será apurado para integrar a Companhia Americana de Balé.

programme.title: Outlander

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: L'Enfer Est Pavé de Bonnes Intentions
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Receita para Matar
programme.desc: A psicóloga e antiga procuradora Hailey Dean ajuda o seu amigo, o detetive Fincher Garland, a investigar uma crescente vaga de homicídios no hospital Atlanta Memorial, quando a namorada de Fincher, a médica Meghan Phillips, é considerada suspeita do primeiro homicídio.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Sentença de Morte
programme.desc: Hailey Dean sabe que a procuradora Paulina D'Orazio está inocente no homicídio de um homem que em tempos mandou para a prisão, e tem de fazer tudo ao seu alcance para o provar perante o número crescente de provas contra ela.

programme.title: Música e Letra
programme.desc: Alex Fletcher, um antigo elemento de um popular grupo dos anos 80, junta-se à "palavrosa" Sophie para comporem uma canção, que se destina a uma jovem estrela pop.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. programme.title: Maridos e Mulheres
programme.desc: Gabe e Judy estão chocados com a separação dos melhores amigos. Mas esta situação faz com que eles se questionem sobre o seu relacionamento. Enquanto Gabe pensa em namoriscar uma das suas alunas, o outro casal descobre que a vida de solteiro não é assim tão boa e pensa dar nova vida ao casamento.

programme.title: Amigos Coloridos
programme.desc: Jamie, uma executiva de recursos humanos, tenta convencer um potencial candidato, Dylan, a mudar-se para Nova Iorque. Apesar da atração mútua, depressa chegam à conclusão de que representam tudo aquilo que sempre quiseram evitar numa relação. Por isso, decidem ser apenas amigos... coloridos.

programme.title: Vencer o Preconceito
programme.desc: Uma família afro-americana luta contra a pobreza, o racismo e o conflito interno, enquanto tentam ter uma vida melhor.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Sentença de Morte
programme.desc: Hailey Dean sabe que a procuradora Paulina D'Orazio está inocente no homicídio de um homem que em tempos mandou para a prisão, e tem de fazer tudo ao seu alcance para o provar perante o número crescente de provas contra ela.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Crisântemos Para Que Vos Quero
programme.desc: Abby Knight volta à sua cidade natal para abrir uma loja de flores mas, no dia da inauguração, o seu carro sofre um acidente por causa de um criminoso em fuga.

programme.title: Dizem Por Aí...
programme.desc: Sarah Huttinger concordou em casar, mas está apavorada com a ideia. A sua carreira de jornalista estagnou na página de obituário do New York Times. A sua irmã Annie decidiu casar-se com o parceiro de ténis e Sarah vai ter que assistir ao enlace, o que significa passar tempo com a sua família...

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Une Femme Avertie En Vaut Deux
programme.desc: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. It's serious about the crime. I like that It's not full of blood and guts. The cast is perfect. I highly recommend this show.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1037,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: Uma Noite Com o Presidente
programme.desc: Andrew Shepherd é Presidente dos EUA e apaixona-se por uma ecologista de um grupo de pressão, que é uma intrigante política a favor do ambiente. À medida que o romance progride, a popularidade de Andrew começa a cair.

programme.title: Sete Vidas
programme.desc: Atormentado por um segredo, Ben Thomas procura a sua redenção transformando radicalmente a vida de sete desconhecidos que escolheu criteriosamente. A única coisa que estas pessoas têm em comum é que chegaram a um ponto de viragem nas suas vidas e precisam que algo mude.

programme.title: O Coleccionador de Ossos
programme.desc: Lincoln Rhyme, um brilhante detetive criminal, agora tetraplégico, é chamado para ajudar a investigar um crime misterioso em parceria com uma polícia "novata". Sem sair da cama, Lincoln dirige Amelia pelos medonhos cenários criminais, diabolicamente arquitetados por um serial killer "colecionador".

programme.title: Rixa No Bloco 99
programme.desc: Um antigo pugilista, que se tornou correio de droga, acaba no campo de batalha de uma prisão, depois de um negócio correr mal...

programme.title: Dia de Fúria
programme.desc: Na Espanha do século XVI, o agente da lei Ruy de Mendoza investiga uma série de crimes bizarros e misteriosos, mas quando vê que se levantam muitos obstáculos ao seu trabalho, percebe que há uma teia maior de interesses por trás de tudo.

programme.title: Águas Sangrentas
programme.desc: Quando umas miniférias se tornam uma experiência mortal, um ex-marine vai ter de arriscar a vida para salvar a mulher e o melhor amigo de um pirata dos tempos modernos, enquanto tenta controlar os fantasmas da guerra que pensava ter deixado para trás.

programme.title: Acordado
programme.desc: Um homem acorda numa cama de hospital sem memória de quem é e fica a saber que é procurado pela polícia e acusado de uma série de crimes.

programme.title: Duelo Imortal - Parte II
programme.desc: No futuro, o espadachim imortal Connor MacLeod, que está a ser perseguido por extraterrestres mercenários, tem de prevenir a destruição da Terra, que vive quase na escuridão devido ao escudo criado para fazer face à degradação da camada de ozono.

programme.title: Duelo Imortal III
programme.desc: Pensando que ganhou o derradeiro Prémio e é o único imortal, Connor MacLeod vê a sua vida pacata terminar quando Kane, que estava há séculos preso numa gruta no Japão, se vê liberto do seu túmulo e parte em busca do espadachim para o matar.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Uma equipa de filmagens entra no mundo misterioso da Amazónia em busca da tribo Shirishama, sobre a qual pretendem fazer um documentário. No entanto, "tropeça" numa anaconda gigante que os tentará dizimar a todos.

programme.title: First Kill - Caça ao Homem
programme.desc: Procurando aproximar-se do filho Danny, o bem-sucedido Will Beamon decide organizar um fim de semana na cabana onde cresceu. Enquanto caçam, pai e filho testemunham um homicídio. Danny é feito refém pelos criminosos e Will enfrenta circunstâncias extremas para o salvar.

programme.title: Outcast - O Último Templário
programme.desc: Gallain, um guerreiro misterioso, junta-se aos filhos de um imperador chinês deposto para destronar o seu irmão cruel, que procura vê-los mortos. Jacob, que enfrenta os seus próprios "fantasmas", também se junta a eles, procurando salvar o reino e colocar o príncipe no trono.

programme.title: Era Uma Vez No México
programme.desc: Sands é um peculiar agente da CIA destinado no México. Segundo ele, a sua missão é manter o equilíbrio no país. Quando descobre que Barillo planeia assassinar o Presidente através do general Marquez, vai em busca do legendário El Mariachi, que vive isolado, para que este acabe com ele.

programme.title: Combate ao Passado
programme.desc: O agente Michael Dixon patrulha a fronteira entre os EUA e o México. A sua vida vai dar uma reviravolta quando a sua mulher e a filha são ameaçadas de morte por um gangue de Los Angeles a que ele outrora pertenceu e que o quer forçar a ajudar a traficar drogas entre os dois países.

programme.title: Rixa No Bloco 99
programme.desc: Um antigo pugilista, que se tornou correio de droga, acaba no campo de batalha de uma prisão, depois de um negócio correr mal...

programme.title: Testemunha Indiscreta
programme.desc: Após o falecimento da filha, um virar de página e a procura de uma nova vida bem longe da tragédia. O casal vai tomar conta de um motel no meio do nada. Numa das salas do motel, há uma sala muito requisitada pelos clientes com uma estranha passagem e que desemboca num também muito estranho espelho.

programme.title: Rambo - A Fúria do Herói
programme.desc: Rambo, veterano da Guerra do Vietname, é preso injustamente por Teasle, mas consegue fugir e dá início a um confronto não só contra o xerife, mas contra toda uma cidade.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: Red e Mandy levam uma vida tranquila numa cabana isolada junto a um lago do Colorado. Um dia, a sua casa é invadida por membros de uma seita religiosa que matam Mandy e deixam Red à beira da morte. Traumatizado, apenas uma coisa o mantém preso à vida: um intenso desejo de punir os responsáveis.

programme.title: Onda de Crimes
programme.desc: Leyre pensa que a sua vida não pode piorar depois de o marido a ter trocado pela melhor amiga e ser despejada de casa. Mas é quando ele é assassinado e ela se torna a principal suspeita, que percebe que as aventuras e peripécias ainda mal começaram.

programme.title: Fintar o Destino
programme.desc: Mané foi um futebolista famoso em Cabo Verde mas perdeu a oportunidade de sair da sua terra para ir jogar para o Benfica e nunca conseguiu ultrapassar a sensação de frustração e oportunidade perdida. Agora, aos 50 anos, vai tentar o impossível e parte para Lisboa.

programme.title: Iris
programme.desc: A vida da brilhante escritora inglesa Iris Murdoch e a sua 'imersão' na doença de Alzheimer. A sua história desde que se casou com o inteletual John Bayley até à sua morte.

programme.title: O Pequeno Vampiro (V.P.)
programme.desc: Rudolph é um vampiro cujo clã é ameaçado por um caçador de vampiros. Ele conhece Tony, um humano fascinado por vampiros, que o ajuda nesta batalha cheia de aventura e algumas dentadinhas! Juntos salvam a família de Rudolph e criam uma grande amizade.

programme.title: Capitão Cuecas - O Filme (V.P.)
programme.desc: George e Harold passam os dias a criar histórias de banda desenhada e a sonhar com partidas. Um dia hipnotizam, acidentalmente, o diretor da escola, levando-o a acreditar que é o Capitão Cuecas, um super-herói completamente tolo, vestido apenas de cuecas e capa.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Aliens intergaláticos interpretam imagens de videojogos clássicos como declarações de guerra e a Terra é atacada. Agora, cabe a um ex-campeão de jogos da década de 80 liderar uma equipa de jogadores da velha guarda, derrotar os aliens e salvar o planeta.

programme.title: Cosmoball - Os Jogadores da Galáxia
programme.desc: Uma enorme nave espacial ergue-se acima da Terra – é uma espécie de estádio para um jogo vagamente parecido com o futebol moderno, mas a velocidades incrivelmente altas. Este é um jogo de bola espacial e quando o jogo começa, o mundo para para ver.

programme.title: A Legião dos Duros
programme.desc: Em Marselha, em 1925, Alain é um pugilista que é contratado por um mafioso para perder um combate. Quando não cumpre o acordado, vê-se forçado a fugir e acaba por se alistar na Legião Estrangeira e ser enviado para combater em Marrocos.

programme.title: O Turista
programme.desc: Frank, um pacato norte-americano de férias em Veneza, conhece Elise, uma mulher que esconde um misterioso segredo. A sua relação rapidamente se transforma numa complicada teia de perigos e enganos, quando se veem perseguidos pela Interpol, pela polícia italiana e por assassinos russos.

programme.title: Amar... é Complicado!
programme.desc: Aos 50 anos, Jane sente que atingiu a estabilidade: os filhos cresceram, o negócio corre bem e superou o trauma do divórcio. Já a vida do ex-marido, Jake, está uma confusão. Mas, num encontro casual, o ex-casal redescobre a paixão. E o inesperado acontece: Jane transforma-se na amante do ex-marido.

programme.title: Rambo - A Fúria do Herói
programme.desc: Rambo, veterano da Guerra do Vietname, é preso injustamente por Teasle, mas consegue fugir e dá início a um confronto não só contra o xerife, mas contra toda uma cidade.

programme.title: Rambo: A Vingança do Herói
programme.desc: Rambo, veterano do Vietname, regressa à selva para descobrir prisioneiros americanos, mas é atraiçoado pelo comando da operação e terá de escapar à sua maneira.

programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: Scorpion
Scorpion
programme.desc:
Scorpion: Created by Nick Santora. With Elyes Gabel, Katharine McPhee, Eddie Kaye Thomas, Jadyn Wong. An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3514324/","name":"Scorpion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY2MjY2MGQtYjhjZi00OGY3LWFjMWUtMGQxZmUyODkzZmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3514324/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"joelle-187-946173"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't listen to the haters-Scorpion is fantastic!","reviewBody":"To all the 'genius' critics who think they are so smart, pointing out all the flaws in Scorpion like some sort of scientific professors of TV shows, commenting that it is unoriginal and cliché---Please take a look at all the negative reviews of this show and try to differentiate yours. You can't, can you? Your pretentious reviews are just as cliché as you think Scorpion is. I bet you are extremely impressed with your enlightening review in which you discuss how the show is unbelievable- because I for one TOTALLY didn't notice that a girl standing up out of the roof of a sports car holding a laptop connected to a cable coming from an airplane flying a foot above her head was unbelievable. So thanks for pointing that out for me.

WHAT I AM SAYING IS, I don't think this show is MEANT to be very realistic. Pretty sure the writers are aware of the content within their own scripts. Most TV shows and movies ARE NOT realistic- that's not the point of entertainment! DUH! If you want realistic, watch a documentary, or hey, even more realistic: watch some paint dry. I've read some people comment on how CSI is way better than Scorpion because it is "realistic" Um .I'm pretty sure that the actors on CSI do that exact same thing where they type 800words/minute and the computer magically solves every crazy problem, hacks into any system, and they are able to zoom so far in on security cam photos that you can see the criminals pores. The point is, you watch entertainment and shows like Scorpion for the action, the likable characters, the entertainment factor, and Scorpion has ALL of that. Plus, it's fun, friendly, and can appeal to a wide age range. My younger sister (10), my dad(an old guy), and myself (18), all LOVE this show.

In each negative review, I'm seeing 'premise good & execution bad'. Yes, the premise is excellent, but the execution is excellent as well. The only thing wrong here is . a bunch of bitter reviewers.

Of course you are all entitled to your own opinions, as am I, and I'll stop the bashing now. I'd like to thank all of you negative reviewers for helping us dumb folk out there realize the flaws that you assume we failed to notice while watching our show. Thank you for your pessimistic picking apart of a fun and entertaining TV show. Your opinion is well valued, and there needs to be a little negativity, you know, to balance out the positive, fun, wonderful plot and characters that make up SCORPION! Sincerely, thank you.

p.s. IMDb data; ttnr: 3514324, Title: Scorpion, --- Description: Scorpion: Created by Nick Santora. With Elyes Gabel, Katharine McPhee, Eddie Kaye Thomas, Jadyn Wong. An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3514324/","name":"Scorpion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY2MjY2MGQtYjhjZi00OGY3LWFjMWUtMGQxZmUyODkzZmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3514324/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"joelle-187-946173","dateCreated":"2014-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't listen to the haters-Scorpion is fantastic!","reviewBody":"To all the 'genius' critics who think they are so smart, pointing out all the flaws in Scorpion like some sort of scientific professors of TV shows, commenting that it is unoriginal and cliché---Please take a look at all the negative reviews of this show and try to differentiate yours. You can't, can you? Your pretentious reviews are just as cliché as you think Scorpion is. I bet you are extremely impressed with your enlightening review in which you discuss how the show is unbelievable- because I for one TOTALLY didn't notice that a girl standing up out of the roof of a sports car holding a laptop connected to a cable coming from an airplane flying a foot above her head was unbelievable. So thanks for pointing that out for me.

WHAT I AM SAYING IS, I don't think this show is MEANT to be very realistic. Pretty sure the writers are aware of the content within their own scripts. Most TV shows and movies ARE NOT realistic- that's not the point of entertainment! DUH! If you want realistic, watch a documentary, or hey, even more realistic: watch some paint dry. I've read some people comment on how CSI is way better than Scorpion because it is "realistic" Um .I'm pretty sure that the actors on CSI do that exact same thing where they type 800words/minute and the computer magically solves every crazy problem, hacks into any system, and they are able to zoom so far in on security cam photos that you can see the criminals pores. The point is, you watch entertainment and shows like Scorpion for the action, the likable characters, the entertainment factor, and Scorpion has ALL of that. Plus, it's fun, friendly, and can appeal to a wide age range. My younger sister (10), my dad(an old guy), and myself (18), all LOVE this show.

In each negative review, I'm seeing 'premise good & execution bad'. Yes, the premise is excellent, but the execution is excellent as well. The only thing wrong here is . a bunch of bitter reviewers.

Of course you are all entitled to your own opinions, as am I, and I'll stop the bashing now. I'd like to thank all of you negative reviewers for helping us dumb folk out there realize the flaws that you assume we failed to notice while watching our show. Thank you for your pessimistic picking apart of a fun and entertaining TV show. Your opinion is well valued, and there needs to be a little negativity, you know, to balance out the positive, fun, wonderful plot and characters that make up SCORPION! Sincerely, thank you.

p.s. I would recommend seeing a doctor about removing the sticks from your butts.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49440,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-09-22","keywords":"homeland security,outcast,misfit,nerd,brilliant mind","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1175468/","name":"Elyes Gabel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1897713/","name":"Katharine McPhee","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0858776/","name":"Eddie Kaye Thomas"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176022/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0500483/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374900/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1238801/","name":"Nick Santora"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2548022553","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNjZDBiZWYtOTUwYi00NzlkLTg0OWItN2U5ZmJkMDNhMDkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmNjZDBiZWYtOTUwYi00NzlkLTg0OWItN2U5ZmJkMDNhMDkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Sam Hill, Omar Madha, Jeff T. programme.desc:
Scorpion: Created by Nick Santora. With Elyes Gabel, Katharine McPhee, Eddie Kaye Thomas, Jadyn Wong. An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3514324/","name":"Scorpion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY2MjY2MGQtYjhjZi00OGY3LWFjMWUtMGQxZmUyODkzZmVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"An eccentric genius forms an international network of super-geniuses to act as the last line of defense against the complicated threats of the modern world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3514324/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"joelle-187-946173"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't listen to the haters-Scorpion is fantastic!","reviewBody":"To all the 'genius' critics who think they are so smart, pointing out all the flaws in Scorpion like some sort of scientific professors of TV shows, commenting that it is unoriginal and cliché---Please take a look at all the negative reviews of this show and try to differentiate yours. You can't, can you? Your pretentious reviews are just as cliché as you think Scorpion is. I bet you are extremely impressed with your enlightening review in which you discuss how the show is unbelievable- because I for one TOTALLY didn't notice that a girl standing up out of the roof of a sports car holding a laptop connected to a cable coming from an airplane flying a foot above her head was unbelievable. So thanks for pointing that out for me.

WHAT I AM SAYING IS, I don't think this show is MEANT to be very realistic. Pretty sure the writers are aware of the content within their own scripts. Most TV shows and movies ARE NOT realistic- that's not the point of entertainment! DUH! If you want realistic, watch a documentary, or hey, even more realistic: watch some paint dry. I've read some people comment on how CSI is way better than Scorpion because it is "realistic" Um .I'm pretty sure that the actors on CSI do that exact same thing where they type 800words/minute and the computer magically solves every crazy problem, hacks into any system, and they are able to zoom so far in on security cam photos that you can see the criminals pores. The point is, you watch entertainment and shows like Scorpion for the action, the likable characters, the entertainment factor, and Scorpion has ALL of that. Plus, it's fun, friendly, and can appeal to a wide age range. My younger sister (10), my dad(an old guy), and myself (18), all LOVE this show.

In each negative review, I'm seeing 'premise good & execution bad'. Yes, the premise is excellent, but the execution is excellent as well. The only thing wrong here is . a bunch of bitter reviewers.

Of course you are all entitled to your own opinions, as am I, and I'll stop the bashing now. I'd like to thank all of you negative reviewers for helping us dumb folk out there realize the flaws that you assume we failed to notice while watching our show. Thank you for your pessimistic picking apart of a fun and entertaining TV show. Your opinion is well valued, and there needs to be a little negativity, you know, to balance out the positive, fun, wonderful plot and characters that make up SCORPION! Sincerely, thank you.

p.s. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. IMDb data; ttnr: 7491982, Title: FBI, --- Description: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp","dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS. Put S1 on All Access too while you're at it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12189,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-25","keywords":"violence,police investigation,copaganda,fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1335291/","name":"Missy Peregrym","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4976368/","name":"Zeeko Zaki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005438/","name":"Jeremy Sisto"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1541762/","name":"Craig Turk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937725/","name":"Dick Wolf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi251968281","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM2YTdkNmItYzNhOC00MjBmLWExMDEtZmNmZWZhMTRjNjgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Alex Chapple, Jean de Segonzac, Stephen Surjik, Norberto Barba, Monica Raymund

programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"guitar_flake324"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A TV show to tape","reviewBody":"I love this show, since the premiere episode. I'm pretty sure it's going to stick around for a while. I've heard negative comments about it, but I'm okay with that, because the ratings speak for themselves. The characters are exceptional as are the actors who portray them. it was sad to see Kim Delaney go but her character was only one dimensional so its okay.\n\nDavid Caruso is amazingly good at playing H, and he just makes you come back for more. Emily Procter is beautiful and intelligent, she shares that with her character Calleigh and that makes it even more fun to watch her. Adam Rodriquez and Khandi Alexander hold their own, but i wish they'd get more on screen action. Eric and Alexx are wonderful characters and should be explored. On to my latest obsession, I watch this show for Rory Cochrane, he's talented, and enigmatic, and Tim Speedle is wonderful at his job. Needless to say I'm CSI:M number 1 fan"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: FBI
FBI
programme.desc: FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7491982/","name":"FBI","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5Mjg5NDk4OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjY1ODIyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"blueoysterdvp"},"dateCreated":"2020-01-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Tale Of Two Seasons","reviewBody":"Some viewers leaving comments here appear to be watching Season 2 only. If you have CBS All Access that can be understandable since they DON'T carry S1. For $10 bucks a month it should be available. Just watching S2 can get confusing if you haven't seen the much better Season One minus the "Most Wanted" episode. That episode was the Pilot for "FBI: Most Wanted" and not very good. The First Season of FBI was more suspenseful with better writing and plots. The same could be said for the characters. Where's Ian Lim been lately played by James Chen? A much better character than what looks like his replacement Kelly Moran played by Taylor Anthony Miller. Not a good replacement so far. Hopefully Chen comes back. A big loss for the show. Sela Ward as Dana Mosier was leaving after Season One no matter what. A huge loss. Her replacement Alana De La Garza as Isobel Castile has been a hit or miss affair. Horrible in S2 E1 "Little Egypt", better in every show after. Still no Dana though. John Boyd as Stuart Scola has been bringing S2 down. Why his "Barney Fife" character hasn't been written off the show is a better mystery than some of the S2 plots. His new partner Emily Ryder played by Catherine Haena Kim has been solid so far. She has a future in acting. Why Kristen Chazel (Ebonee Noel) was taken out of the field as Scola's partner is baffling. Maybe due to the absence of Iam at headquarters? S2 is not S1 yet. It's not bad either, though uneven. Viewers that don't watch or like FBI are going to give those One Star ratings that don't make sense. If it's a bonafide 1 Star show it would've been yanked off the air after 5 shows. For those folks, don't watch this show. If you watch more than 3 episodes such a low Star rating doesn't make sense. Anyway, I hope FBI gets back to the S1 caliber of writing and acting. After that "Most Wanted" episode in S1 I saw a giant Red Flag. "Little Egypt" S2's first episode was another flag. Hopefully they continue for the better. Maggie and OA got me interested in FBI from the start. The acting chemistry is there. Now give them the surrounding plots and characters that made S1 so good CBS.
